fermentables.notes: The use of BEST Wiener results in a full golden beer color, excellent foaming and a pleasant, full-bodied taste in the final beer. Unlike BEST Heidelberg, this malt uses two-row malting barley varieties that form more coloring substances during the malting process. The protein content is slightly higher than in a Pilsen malt from the same harvest, with comparable enzyme content and high extract values.
fermentables.name: BEST Vienna

fermentables.notes: Red Rye Crystal imparts a beautiful ruby red hue to beers whilst offering a well-rounded, sweet, malty flavour. Great Autumnal flavour for seasonal beers.
fermentables.name: Red Rye Crystal

fermentables.notes:
Adjunct for bitters, milds and stouts 3% – 5% of grist.
Main Characteristics – Strong coffee Flavour.
fermentables.name: Chocolate Malt

hops.notes: Cluster Fugget™ is a spontaneous hop blend that is just that...a cluster Fugget of Pacific Northwestern varieties, capturing the adventurous spirit of the home brewing community. Whether it is your first batch, or your one-hundredth, every home brewer has wound up brewing a beer with a cluster Fugget of aromas and flavors. This hop blend was created in celebration of these fortunate mistakes, reminding us that no brew should be taken too seriously.
hops.name: Cluster Fugget (T90)
Ahtanum
hops.notes: Yakima valley bred Ahtanum is sweet and peppery with a piney citrus aspect. Warmly aromatic and moderately bittering, a hop of distinction. Often likened to Cascade, but is less bitter, alpha acids lower and its grapefruit essence is significantly more pronounced. Notes of lemon and grapefruit.
Powerful tropical fruit and citrus notes with  resiny pine and a touch of black tea thrown in.
hops.name: Idaho 7

hops.notes: Yakima valley bred Ahtanum is sweet and peppery with a piney citrus aspect. Warmly aromatic and moderately bittering, a hop of distinction. Often likened to Cascade, but is less bitter, alpha acids lower and its grapefruit essence is significantly more pronounced. Notes of lemon and grapefruit.
hops.name: Ahtanum
Azacca (T90)
hops.notes: A dual-use, high-alpha hop. Aroma and flavor characteristics of apricot, ripe mango, orchard fruit, orange, grapefruit, pine, and pineapple. Yet another IPA hop to try!!

hops.name: Idaho 7
